page.title: 17VILLAGE CHILDREN,SPARSHOLT.
page.content: In Sparsholt village there is very little for children to do during their leisure time.There used to be a youth club held in the village hall,but it was stopped because not many children attended. There are no parks or clubs except for the village green in Woodman Close,where the children play.It would be more fun if there were slides, swings and roundabouts. A lot of the teenagers go and hang around the bus shelter and talk, ride their BMX bikes and do stunts.It is difficult for them to go into the city of Winchester,which is about five miles away because they do not have transport and the last bus is at 7.00p.m. The cricket and fooball club are the only clubs in the village but you have to be a member.
